description.ko: FLORA-9은 실리콘과 토양의 경계를 탐구하며, 투명한 수정 구조를 통해 데이터가 수액처럼 흐르는 생물 발광 숲을 묘사합니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 explores the boundary between silicon and soil, depicting a bioluminescent forest where data flows like sap through translucent crystalline structures.

prompt: A hyper-realistic digital nature landscape of FLORA-9, featuring translucent bioluminescent flowers with integrated fiber-optic veins, holographic spores floating in the air, complex geometric fractals emerging from organic roots, neon cyan and deep violet color palette, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, surreal atmosphere.
